attributes.action: lower gas and electric prices in england, we pay more than any country,  globel warming scam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im very unhappy with the prices of electric and gas in england, that keep going up 2 or 3 times a year , how do you feel about old pepole the govermant is doing nothing to stop the prices going up, if you ask me i think its a globel warming scam , to make us pay more for fuel. then the goverment cant understand why we are not spending, the price is so unfair and most pepole on a low income go without food just to keep warm or vice versa , the govermant needs to take action now. and needs to start helping the pepole that put them in power. u.k pay more for gas and electric than any other country its mad to say we are one of the most welthy country  gordan brown take action be 4 we all take you out of government start doing your job.

rejection.details:
Similar petitions already exist eg:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/utilitybills/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UTILITYRIPOFF/

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/carbon-rubbish/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
